answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
Virginia Barney,
Attached you will find guideline principles for the City of Woodland, CA. Their principles differ from Shorelines, in that they're more long term and address capital projects. Additionally, if you click the the following link, you will find  Washtenaw County, MI budget reduction principles. I hope this helps.
http://www.ewashtenaw.org/government/administrator/budget/2010-2011-budget-process/budget_reduction_prin.html

author: Virginia Barney
text:
I read with interest the article in PM about Shoreline, WA's guiding budget reduction principles.  Do other cities have guiding principles to share or methodology to determine reductions?
Thank you.
Virginia Barney
title: Guiding principles for budget reductions
